casebody.data:
MATTHEWS et al. v. LITTLE, CITY CLERK OF THE CITY OF ATLANTA No. 1225,

Misc.

Decided February 27, 1970 Frederic S. Le Clercq for appellants. Henry L. Bowden and John E. Dougherty for appellee. Per Curiam.

The motion for leave to proceed in forma pauperis is granted. The motion to dismiss is also granted and the appeal is dismissed as moot.
